title: KOKO
overview: The documentary series KOKO, about the Olympic, World and European champion athlete, presents the life of István Kovács Kokó in four parts. The still popular boxer tells the story of the highs and lows of his life and sporting career. You will meet the people who were influential in his life and hear from legends such as Imre Szántó (Uncle Öcsi), Dariusz Michalczewski and Vitalij Klicsko.
